The redirect servers are running on Cox Cable IPs in the 68.106.66.0/24 address range and there doesn't appear to be any DNS records attached to the IP addresses. The redirect servers respond to urls in the following format

    http://68.106.66.xxx/data/[hash]/[url]

Where [hash] is a pseudo-random 16 character lowercase alpha numeric code and [url] is the desired redirected resource
For example the following url will redirect to google.com

    http://68.106.66.104:80/data/0123456789abcdef/google.com

When a properly formated HTTP request is issued to the server it either proxies the resource or returns a 302 response with the [url] as the location header. Improperly formated request URLs result in a 404 error.


List of redirect servers
